items.title: Our Belief - THIS SECTION IS EXAMPLE TEXT AND NEEDS REPLACING
items.desc: The DeFi Skeptic team is a strong believer in collaboration over competition. Working with like minded platforms/projects and sharing each others resources is a key component of DeFi Skeptic and a valued aspect of our platform.

partners.title: Apollo Ventures
partners.desc1: Apollo Ventures is a complete ecosystem to help crypto projects get launched and find vetted services to help promote their project consisting of a marketplace, ads platform and launchpad. Additionally, Apollo Ventures has a loss protection plan which covers anywhere from 25% to 100% of a presale contributors funds incase of exploit or vulnerability.
partners.desc2: DeFi Skeptic provides Apollo Ventures project vetting for the Apollo Launchpad.
partners.desc3: By leveraging DeFi Skeptics intensive vetting process, Apollo Venture ensures projects listing on their launchpad maintain a high level of transparency and information accuracy.

partners.title: Dappd
partners.desc1: Dappd is a software development company specializing in DeFi/Blockchain Technology. Their services include custom smart contract creation, presales, web3 bots, dApps, websites, auditing, and blockchain consulting/development.
partners.desc2: DeFi Skeptic and Dappd are working in a cross-service partnership to leverage each other’s expertise.
partners.desc3: This partnership adds a valuable resource to the DeFi Skeptic ecosystem and supports our goal of legitimizing the space through ethical coding practices.

partners.title: SEEK
partners.desc1: SEEK is a platform focused on DeFi security and education. They offer an industry leading identification verification service (KYC) and harbor a vast community of safe, vetted and established projects under their umbrella. Their goal is to make DeFi a safer place for the investor.
partners.desc2: This partnership will allow SEEK and DeFi Skeptic to leverage key services from each other while supporting our collective goal of making DeFi better!

affiliates.title: AutoCrypto
affiliates.desc1: AutoCrypto is an automated broker app managed by an Artificial Intelligence that combines mathematical extrapolation polynomials alongside a pre-trained time-series prediction neuronal network to predict very precisely the evolution of the top 200 cryptocurrencies and investing automatically for you. AutoCrypto’s mission is to provide people from all income ranges a way to achieve financial independence.
affiliates.desc2: DeFi Skeptic provides AutoCrypto up-to-date reports on vetted projects to support their mission.
affiliates.desc3: This is done automatically through their social platforms anytime a report is finalized.

promoters.title: Legit Crypto Lounge
promoters.desc1: One major issue in the DeFi space is how projects are promoted. A very effective way of reaching an audience is by directly speaking to them. However, many of these platforms conduct in unethical practices using “paid” bots to make their customer feel like they are getting more than they really are.
promoters.desc2: DeFi Skeptic has made an effort to source legitimate promotional platforms who do not conduct in these practices such as

texts.content:
DeFi Skeptic serves DeFi in various ways. One way is by conducting in-depth video interviews with project developers. During this session, the Defi Skeptic team will scrutinize, analyze, and independently review every aspect of the project following the vetting process. Providing this level of detail on DeFi projects can help reduce fraud while increasing security and peace of mind for those looking to invest their hard-earned money.

If you are a project team member and would like to apply to have the project vetted by DeFi Skeptic, you can do so on the Get Vetted page.

DeFi projects that have passed the vetting process are listed in the DeFi Skeptic Vetted Projects page.
